p: Genomic sequencing have identified two strains of NiV: NiV-B and NiV-M. Genetic characterization of the two strains demonstrated that NiV-B has a genome size of 18,252 nucleotides which is longer than NiV-M by six nucleotides [ 49]. Even though both the strains share 91.8% similarity in nucleotide homology, NiV-B is considered to have higher fatality rates [ 49, 50].
